post:
Continuing on the success of our previous LowEndBox and LowEndTalk offers, [QuickPacket](https://www.quickpacket.com) is pleased to offer our popular Dual Xeon L5640 server out of Atlanta, GA.

**Intel Dual Xeon L5640 - Dell or SuperMicro**

- Dual Hex Core 2.26 GHz / 2x 12 MB Cache / HyperThreading (24 Threads!)
- 32 GB RAM standard, up to 144 GB RAM for an additional fee
- 2x 2 TB Serial ATA Hard Drives or 2x 128 GB SSDs
- 4 usable IPv4 addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request (More available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)
- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Atlanta, GA

**$49 per month - Click here to order: [Atlanta](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=194&promocode=LEBAUG49) (COUPON CODE LEBAUG49)**

QuickPacket also offers a number of software licenses as add-ons (open a sales ticket to order):

- cPanel - VPS $11/month - Server $29.99/month
- KernelCare - $2/month
- CloudLinux - $9/month with cPanel, $11/month without
- Softaculous - VPS $1/month - Server $2/month
- WHMCS - Branded $12.80/month - Unbranded $14.80/month
- DirectAdmin - VPS $5/month - Server $9/month

Further details about QuickPacket and the promo offer:

- QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
- Network providers include PCCW, Cogent, Hibernia, GTT, Zayo, and peering ([AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261)).
- Looking Glass/Test File: [Atlanta](http://lg.atl.quickpacket.com)
- Atlanta servers are located in 470 E Paces Ferry Rd NE.
- Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden. Please review our [Terms of Service](http://www.quickpacket.com/tos.html) prior to ordering.
- We accept PayPal, VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
- Coupon code is mentioned above and is embedded in the order link provided. The discounted price will be reflected on the second page of the order form.
- Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers. Promotional offers cannot be combined with other promotional offers.
- Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering. 

Thanks for your interest!
